title: Best Trailers From PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Check out the best trailers from Sony PlayStation Showcase 2023!

Sony PlayStation Showcase 2023 has wrapped up, and in this video we're taking a look at the best trailers from the event. We saw world premieres of Metal Gear Solid 3 Snake Eater Remake and Marathon!

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Metal Gear Solid 3 Snake Eater Delta Reveal
02:06 - Marvel's Spider-Man 2 Gameplay
12:27 - Marathon Reveal
14:05 - Alan Wake 2 Gameplay
15:48 - FINAL FANTASY XVI “SALVATION” 
18:42 - Assassin's Creed Mirage Gameplay
20:45 - Dragons Dogma II Reveal
22:15 - Street Fighter 6 Your Story
24:02 - Ghostrunner 2 Reveal 
25:02 - Five Night At Freddy’s Help Wanted 2
26:02 - Resident Evil 4 VR Mode Reveal
27:16 - Destiny 2 The Final Shape Cinematic Teaser

#playstation #gaming

title: PlayStation Project Q Streaming Handheld Announcement
description: Check out PlayStation's latest streaming handheld codenamed Project Q.

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage 4K Gameplay Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Assassin's Creed is back, this time taking place in Egypt. It's been years since Ubisoft brought us their last Assassin's Creed game, and it will be interesting to see what Mirage brings to the table. Assassin's Creed: Mirage releases October 12.

#assassinscreedmirage #playstation #gaming

title: METAL GEAR SOLID Δ SNAKE EATER 4K Announcement Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER is a faithful remake of Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater. A new generation of players and loyal fans alike can experience the origin story of the famed Big Boss, and witness how his legend was forged in the crucible of Operation Snake Eater.

METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER will be available for PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S, and Steam.

#metalgear #playstation #gaming

title: Marvel's Spider Man 2 Kraven the Hunter Official Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Kraven the Hunter makes his debut in Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 and he’s in search of an equal. That spells “bad news” for the inhabitants of Marvel’s New York. 

Launching Fall 2023, Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 is the next game in PlayStation’s critically acclaimed Marvel’s Spider-Man franchise. Developed by Insomniac Games in collaboration with Marvel Games and PlayStation for the PlayStation 5 console.

title: Marvel's Spider Man 2 Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Kraven’s Hunters are in pursuit of Dr. Curt Connors, AKA The Lizard, and Spider-Men, Peter Parker and Miles Morales, need to stop them. 

Launching Fall 2023, Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 is the next game in PlayStation’s critically acclaimed Marvel’s Spider-Man franchise. Developed by Insomniac Games in collaboration with Marvel Games and PlayStation for the PlayStation 5 console. 

#playstation #spiderman #gaming

title: Arizona Sunshine 2 Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Arizona Sunshine 2, the next zombie survival game from Vertigo Games is coming to PSVR 2 in 2023.

#arizonasunshine #playstation #gaming

title: Destiny 2: The Final Shape Cinematic Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
In this cinematic trailer recapping previous Destiny events, we get a trailer for Destiny 2: The Final Shape. This upcoming Destiny 2 expansion comes August 22, 2023.

#destiny2 #playstation #gaming

title: Resident Evil 4 Remake VR Mode Reveal Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Capcom is releasing Resident Evil 4 Remake to PlayStation VR2 with an all new First Person mode. There is no set release date, but RE 4 REmake VR was announced to be in development.

#playstation #re4 #gaming

title: Five Nights At Freddy's: Help Wanted 2 Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description: Get ready to step back into the world of FNAF, when Help Wanted 2 comes to PS5 late 2023.

title: Marathon Reveal Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Check out Bungie's next game, Marathon which was showcased at the latest PlayStation Showcase.

#playstation #marathon #bungie #gaming

title: Dragon's Dogma II Reveal Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Capcom's Dragon's Dogma is back from the grave with Dragon's Dogma II. The action RPG has similar weighted combat mechanics to the Souls series, and the latest iteration shows off what incredible monsters you'll have to face off against. Dragon's Dogma received a cult following, with many players coming to love the game far after its initial release. Dragon's Dogma II has no set release date.

#dragonsdogma #playstation #gaming

title: Street Fighter 6 Your Story Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Capcom is releasing Resident Evil 4 Remake to PlayStation VR2 with an all new First Person mode. There is no set release date, but RE 4 REmake VR was announced to be in development.

#streetfighter6 #playstation #gaming

title: Granblue Fantasy: Relink Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Take another look at Cygames’ upcoming action RPG, Granblue Fantasy: Relink, through this brand-new trailer!

#playstation #gaming

title: Alan Wake 2 Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Remedy Entertainment's Alan Wake is back. Uncover the mystery on PS5 this October 17, 2023.

#alanwake2 #playstation #gaming

title: Final Fantasy XVI Salvation Launch Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
“We don’t need your salvation. We’ll save ourselves. And we’ll do it on our own terms.”

Clive Rosfield and his allies fight to take back control of their fate.
What salvation can they bring to Valisthea, a land blessed by the light of the Mothercrystals?

#playstation #sony #gaming

title: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater Remake Reveal Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Snake is back. Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater is getting the remake treatment. Konami also announced it is releasing the original games back on digital storefronts.

#metalgearsolid3 #mgs #gaming

title: Phantom Blade 0 Announcement Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Phantom Blade 0 was revealed today as part of the PlayStation Showcase. Check out the world, combat, and more.

#playstation #gaming

title: Ghostrunner 2 Reveal Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Ghostrunner, the fast paced first person action game from developer One More Level is getting a second installment with Ghostrunner 2, showing off more kinetic combat and its cyberpunk aesthetic. The game got its first look during PlayStation's 2023 Showcase.

#playstation #ghostrunner #gaming

title: Helldivers 2 Announcement Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
Become a Helldiver and save Super Earth from masses of alien creatures. Coming to PS5 and PC in 2023.

#playstation #helldivers2 #gaming

title: Fairgame$ Cinematic Trailer | PlayStation Showcase 2023
description:
PlayStation 2023 Showcase opened with a cinematic trailer for Fairgame$. What consoles it's expected to launch on and when was not detailed.

#playstation #gaming

title: Lego 2K Drive Review
description: The licensed racer from 2K and Visual Concepts is a delightful combination of open-world and kart racers, with tons of Lego customization to boot.

title: Lies Of P - Exclusive Developer Behind-The-Scenes Trailer
description: Take a look behind the scenes of the development of Lies of P featuring interviews with the game's director, Jiwan Choi as well as the game's art director, Changkyu Noh.

title: I Studied The Art of War To Get Better At Video Games | No HUD
description:
Could Sun-Tzu's timeless classic help a humble gamer on the virtual battlefield? Jake answers the questions nobody was asking and throws his precious at this dumb video.

After reading The Art of War a few times, Jake puts together a Flowchart of War designed to lead him to undisputed victory in the original battle royale game: PUBG Battlegrounds.

Special thanks to twitch.tv/moist_walrus for asking the question that ultimately led to this video and making a cameo in it.

#gaming #gamespot #pubg #nohud
